Class ProjectionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.europa.ec.eurostat.jgiscotools.util.ProjectionUtil

  • public class ProjectionUtil
extends Object
    Basic conversion functions for mercator projection.

    julien Gaffuri

      • getDeformationFactor

        public static double getDeformationFactor(double lat)
        Parameters:
        lat - The latitude.
        Returns:
        Deformation factor from the projection (depends only on the latitude). To retrieve the real distance from a projected one, multiply by this factor.
